entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing near midnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
